name: direct-agriconnect-tn
description: Direct AgriConnect TN - Complete Agricultural Marketplace

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:ml
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:ml"

author: Direct AgriConnect TN
